text: DXKS (1080 kHz Surigao City) Radyo Ronda is an AM radio station owned and operated by Radio Philippines Network. Its studio is located along Borromeo St., Brgy. Taft, Surigao City. It airs local updates from Surigao del Norte and some programs from DWIZ 882 Manila.Judge on Duterte drug list resigns from post in SiargaoSchool on the Air on Organic Agriculture launched by ATI CaragaSurigao City Broadcaster Receives Death Threats ==References== Category:Radio stations in Surigao del Norte Category:Radio stations established in 1961 Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines
title: DXKS-AM
